item.title: Help on pickup for my server?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Change

&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("(my name)"))
To && (playerRights >= 2))
that makes it rights 2 and above, which means admin only.

Read full topic
